artist: Artist: Josh Simmons; Publisher: Top Shelf Productions, Marietta, Ga.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, full bleed, photomechanical image of circus figures with designs and text printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 32 pp.
inscription: Title page, fine tip sharpie marker: (drawing of a fly) FLY - - YOU\'RE THE BESTEST - - (heart) JOSH
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Happy, no. 3: Zirkus
